name: TheAtlantic
text: "One conclusion to draw from Monday’s denial to hear those cases is that Chief Justice Roberts may not be so in favor of broadly expanding the scope of the Second Amendment," @adamwinkler writes: https://t.co/DToggsEglT

name: TheAtlantic
text: Over the course of the coronavirus crisis, @khushbuoshea’s relatives have sent her homeopathic “cures,” astrological charts predicting the end of the pandemic, and conspiracy theories. She writes about why misinformation spreads in families: https://t.co/QIRsOM5e30
